duck: Collation - Collation is the assembly of written information into a standard order.
Organizing - Organizing (also spelled organising) is the act of rearranging elements following one or more rules.
Sorting (sediment) - Sorting describes the distribution of grain size of sediments, either in unconsolidated deposits or in sedimentary rocks.
Sorting is the act of defecating in a secret place, an action popularized by the SynIRC user and SCP author "Sorts.
Unicode collation algorithm - The Unicode collation algorithm (UCA) is an algorithm defined in Unicode Technical Report #10, which defines a customizable method to compare two strings.
Sorting algorithm - A sorting algorithm is an algorithm that puts elements of a list in a certain order.

wiki.text:
'Sorting' is any process of arranging items in some sequence and/or in different
sets, and accordingly, it has two common, yet distinct meanings:
# ordering: arranging items of the same kind, class, nature, etc. in some
# ordered sequence, categorizing: grouping and labeling items with similar
# properties together (by sorts).
wiki.title: sorting
